name: icon
description: The name of the icon to be displayed in the search bar. Please refer to the `OcIcon` component to see how to use icon names.

name: placeholder
description: The placeholder text of the search bar input.

name: label
description: The label of the search bar input.

name: small
description: Determines if the search bar is small.

name: buttonLabel
description: The label of the search button.

name: buttonHidden
description: Determines if the search button is hidden.

name: typeAhead
description: Determines if the search bar should perform a search on each keyup event.

name: trimQuery
description: Determines if the search query should be trimmed.

name: loading
description: Determines if the search bar is in a loading state.

name: isFilter
description: Determines if the search bar acts as a local filter. If set to `true`, the `role` attribute will not be set.

name: loadingAccessibleLabel
description: The accessible label for the loading spinner.

name: showCancelButton
description: Determines if the cancel button should be shown. This is mostly used in mobile views.

name: cancelButtonAppearance
description: The appearance of the cancel button.

name: cancelHandler
description: The handler for the cancel button.
